languages.text: "Нашел он и останки людей Ахиллеаса Скаландра. Похоже, они обнаружили признаки скверны, и изменники, дабы сокрыть свои преступления, погребли грехи под руинами улья! На обратном пути транспорт клерка был взорван, но ему чудом удалось уцелеть. Сейчас еретики полагают, что вновь замели следы, они не готовы к нашему удару".

"He also found the remains of Achilleas Scalander's people. It seems that they had noticed the signs of corruption, and the traitors, aiming to cover up their crimes, buried their misdeeds under the ruins of the hive! On the way back, the clerk's transport was destroyed, but he miraculously managed to survive. Now the heretics think that they have covered their tracks once more, and so they continue their plots, oblivious and unprepared for our attack."
languages.original_text: "Нашел он и останки людей Ахиллеаса Скаландра. Похоже, они обнаружили признаки скверны, и изменники, дабы сокрыть свои преступления, погребли грехи под руинами улья! На обратном пути транспорт клерка был взорван, но ему чудом удалось уцелеть. Сейчас еретики полагают, что вновь замели следы, они не готовы к нашему удару".

Now the heretics think that they covered their tracks once more, and they are not prepared for our attack."

languages.text: “他还发现了阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德特工的遗体。那些人似乎是留意到了腐化的迹象，那群叛徒们为了掩盖罪行，杀害了他们，将他们埋在了巢都的废墟之下！那位内政部职员在回来的路上，他的交通工具被摧毁了，但他奇迹般地活了下来。现在，那些异端分子以为他们已经成功地掩盖了踪迹，继续酝酿着他们的阴谋，对我们的反击毫无防备。”
languages.original_text: "He also found the remains of Achilleas Scalander's people. It seems that they had noticed the signs of corruption, and the traitors, aiming to cover up their crimes, buried their misdeeds under the ruins of the hive! On the way back, the clerk's transport was destroyed, but he miraculously managed to survive. Now the heretics think that they have covered their tracks once more, and so they continue their plots, oblivious and unprepared for our attack."

traits.locale_text: “他还发现了阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德特工的遗体。那些人似乎是留意到了腐化的迹象，那群叛徒们为了掩盖罪行，杀害了他们，将他们埋在了巢都的废墟之下！那位内政部职员在回来的路上，他的交通工具被摧毁了，但他奇迹般地活了下来。现在，那些异端分子以为他们已经成功地掩盖了踪迹，继续酝酿着他们的阴谋，对我们的反击毫无防备。”
“他还发现了阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德特工的遗体。那些人似乎是留意到了腐化的迹象，那群叛徒们为了掩盖罪行，杀害了他们，将他们埋在了巢都的废墟之下！那位内政部职员在回来的路上，他的交通工具被摧毁了，但他奇迹般地活了下来。现在，那些异端分子以为他们已经成功地掩盖了踪迹，继续酝酿着他们的阴谋，对我们的反击毫无防备。”

languages.text: «También había encontrado los restos de la gente de Achilleas Scalander. Al parecer, se habían percatado de los signos de corrupción, y los traidores, con el fin de encubrir sus crímenes, enterraron sus fechorías bajo las ruinas de la colmena. En el camino de vuelta, el transporte del secretario fue destruido, pero milagrosamente logró sobrevivir. Ahora los herejes creen que han cubierto sus huellas una vez más, y por eso continúan con sus complots, ajenos y sin preparación para nuestro ataque».
languages.original_text: "He also found the remains of Achilleas Scalander's people. It seems that they had noticed the signs of corruption, and the traitors, aiming to cover up their crimes, buried their misdeeds under the ruins of the hive! On the way back, the clerk's transport was destroyed, but he miraculously managed to survive. Now the heretics think that they have covered their tracks once more, and so they continue their plots, oblivious and unprepared for our attack."

traits.locale_text: «También había encontrado los restos de la gente de Achilleas Scalander. Al parecer, se habían percatado de los signos de corrupción, y los traidores, con el fin de encubrir sus crímenes, enterraron sus fechorías bajo las ruinas de la colmena. En el camino de vuelta, el transporte del secretario fue destruido, pero milagrosamente logró sobrevivir. Ahora los herejes creen que han cubierto sus huellas una vez más, y por eso continúan con sus complots, ajenos y sin preparación para nuestro ataque».

languages.text: 「アキレアス・スカランダーの民の遺体も発見した。彼らは腐敗の兆候に気づいていたようだが、反逆者たちは己の罪を隠そうと、その悪行をハイヴの廃墟の下に埋めたんだ！その帰り、事務官の輸送船は破壊されたが、奇跡的に生き延びたのさ。今になって異端者たちは、自分たちの痕跡をもう一度隠したと思っているのか、我々の攻撃に気づかず、備えもせずに陰謀を実行し続けている」
languages.original_text: "He also found the remains of Achilleas Scalander's people. It seems that they had noticed the signs of corruption, and the traitors, aiming to cover up their crimes, buried their misdeeds under the ruins of the hive! On the way back, the clerk's transport was destroyed, but he miraculously managed to survive. Now the heretics think that they have covered their tracks once more, and so they continue their plots, oblivious and unprepared for our attack."

traits.locale_text: 「アキレアス・スカランダーの民の遺体も発見した。彼らは腐敗の兆候に気づいていたようだが、反逆者たちは己の罪を隠そうと、その悪行をハイヴの廃墟の下に埋めたんだ！その帰り、事務官の輸送船は破壊されたが、奇跡的に生き延びたのさ。今になって異端者たちは、自分たちの痕跡をもう一度隠したと思っているのか、我々の攻撃に気づかず、備えもせずに陰謀を実行し続けている」
「アキレアス・スカランダーの民の遺体も発見した。彼らは腐敗の兆候に気づいていたようだが、反逆者たちは己の罪を隠そうと、その悪行をハイヴの廃墟の下に埋めたんだ！その帰り、事務官の輸送船は破壊されたが、奇跡的に生き延びたのさ。今になって異端者たちは、自分たちの痕跡をもう一度隠したと思っているのか、我々の攻撃に気づかず、備えもせずに陰謀を実行し続けている」

languages.text: « Il a aussi découvert les cadavres de gens d'Achilleas Scalander. Apparemment, ces derniers avaient remarqué des signes de corruption, et les traîtres, ne voulant pas être découverts, ont enterré les preuves de leur forfait sous les ruines de la ruche ! En revenant, le vaisseau du greffier a été détruit, mais l'homme a miraculeusement survécu. Les hérétiques pensent avoir couvert leurs traces et continuent d'ourdir leur complot. Clairement, ils ne s'attendent pas à une attaque de notre part. »
languages.original_text: "He also found the remains of Achilleas Scalander's people. It seems that they had noticed the signs of corruption, and the traitors, aiming to cover up their crimes, buried their misdeeds under the ruins of the hive! On the way back, the clerk's transport was destroyed, but he miraculously managed to survive. Now the heretics think that they have covered their tracks once more, and so they continue their plots, oblivious and unprepared for our attack."

traits.locale_text: « Il a aussi découvert les cadavres de gens d'Achilleas Scalander. Apparemment, ces derniers avaient remarqué des signes de corruption, et les traîtres, ne voulant pas être découverts, ont enterré les preuves de leur forfait sous les ruines de la ruche ! En revenant, le vaisseau du greffier a été détruit, mais l'homme a miraculeusement survécu. Les hérétiques pensent avoir couvert leurs traces et continuent d'ourdir leur complot. Clairement, ils ne s'attendent pas à une attaque de notre part. »

languages.text: "Er hatte auch die Überreste der Leute von Achilleas Scalander gefunden. Sie hatten offenbar die Anzeichen der Verderbnis bemerkt, und die Verräter haben ihre Missetaten unter den Ruinen der Makropole begraben, um ihre Verbrechen zu vertuschen! Auf dem Rückweg wurde der Transporter des Beamten zerstört, er hat jedoch wie durch ein Wunder überlebt. Nun glauben die Ketzer, dass sie ihre Spuren erneut verwischt haben. Sie treiben also weiter ihr Unwesen und ahnen nichts von unserem Angriff. Sie sind völlig unvorbereitet."
languages.original_text: "He also found the remains of Achilleas Scalander's people. It seems that they had noticed the signs of corruption, and the traitors, aiming to cover up their crimes, buried their misdeeds under the ruins of the hive! On the way back, the clerk's transport was destroyed, but he miraculously managed to survive. Now the heretics think that they have covered their tracks once more, and so they continue their plots, oblivious and unprepared for our attack."

traits.locale_text: "Er hatte auch die Überreste der Leute von Achilleas Scalander gefunden. Sie hatten offenbar die Anzeichen der Verderbnis bemerkt, und die Verräter haben ihre Missetaten unter den Ruinen der Makropole begraben, um ihre Verbrechen zu vertuschen! Auf dem Rückweg wurde der Transporter des Beamten zerstört, er hat jedoch wie durch ein Wunder überlebt. Nun glauben die Ketzer, dass sie ihre Spuren erneut verwischt haben. Sie treiben also weiter ihr Unwesen und ahnen nichts von unserem Angriff. Sie sind völlig unvorbereitet."

languages.text: "Ayrıca Achilleas Scalander'ın emrindekilerin kalıntılarını da bulmuş. Görünüşe göre yozlaşma emareleri fark etmişler. Suçlarını örtbas etme niyetindeki hainler de kabahatlerini kovan harabelerinin altına gömmüşler! Geri dönüş yolunda kâtibin aracı yok edilmiş ancak kâtip, mucizevi bir şekilde hayatta kalmayı başarmış. Kâfirler şu anda bir kez daha izlerini kaybettirdiklerini sanıyor. Bundandır ki entrikalarına devam ediyorlar. Saldırımızdan bihaberler ve hazırlıksızlar."
languages.original_text: "He also found the remains of Achilleas Scalander's people. It seems that they had noticed the signs of corruption, and the traitors, aiming to cover up their crimes, buried their misdeeds under the ruins of the hive! On the way back, the clerk's transport was destroyed, but he miraculously managed to survive. Now the heretics think that they have covered their tracks once more, and so they continue their plots, oblivious and unprepared for our attack."

Geri dönüş yolunda kâtibin aracı yok edilmiş ancak kâtip, mucizevi bir şekilde hayatta kalmayı başarmış. Kâfirler şu anda bir kez daha izlerini kaybettirdiklerini sanıyor. Bundandır ki entrikalarına devam ediyorlar. Saldırımızdan bihaberler ve hazırlıksızlar."
